comments.html: We'd hope that we have the imagination to see how great whatever we're currently doing is for us, assuming we've found happiness therein. I'm a middling software writer (I'm not sure I'd call myself an "engineer") and a father and while I might would like to ply my skills in an organization that better fits my creative pursuits (I work in payroll), I still like farting around with/in code. And being a dad is no-holds the best thing ever.
